dcterms:creator: P. Helber
B. Bischke
A. Dengel
D. Borth
dcterms:description: EuroSAT is a dataset consisting of 27,000 images in RGB and 13-band multispectral format, collected by the Sentinel-2A satellite, categorized into ten classes such as river, forest, and permanent crop. It is used for land use and land cover classification.
dcterms:title: EuroSAT

dcterms:creator: Y. Yang
S. Newsam
dcterms:description: The UC Merced Land Use dataset is a well-established dataset for land scene classification, consisting of 2,100 images categorized into 21 classes, such as beach, forest, and storage tanks, with each class represented by 100 images.
dcterms:title: UC Merced Land Use (UCM)

dcterms:creator: G.-S. Xia
J. Hu
F. Hu
B. Shi
X. Bai
Y. Zhong
L. Zhang
X. Lu
dcterms:description: The Aerial Image Dataset (AID) is a benchmark dataset for aerial scene classification, containing 10,000 images across 30 classes, providing a comprehensive resource for evaluating classification performance.
dcterms:title: Aerial Image Dataset (AID)
